masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Your little sibling FOUND THE BASE. They followed you. There are pictures on their phone. They're threatening to post them unless we 'make them an honorary member.' The team is freaking out. This compromises EVERYONE. What do we do?!"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Do damage control on the security breach
  • Handle your siblingâ€”they're not malicious, just nosy
  • Decide: memory wipe, recruitment, or trust?
